item.description:
Red Sox Natives are offering this weekend motorcoach tour and Bruins game ticket through Games Away Tours Inc. departing early Friday, February 18 thru Sunday, February 20. The Bruins play the Ottawa Senators on Friday night February 18.

Includes:

Round-trip DVD equipped motorcoach departing from Boston, Braintree and Methuen

First-class hotel accommodations for Friday night at the Lord Elgin Hotel in Ottawa, and Saturday night at the Holiday Inn Midtown in Montreal

Reserved balcony seating for Friday nights 7:00pm Bruins/Senators game at the Scotia Bank Place

Optional lower level seating for extra $50.00

All applicable taxes

For more information, options, prices and to register contact Paul at Games Away Tours Inc. at 617-426-3164.

Details may change. It is your responsibility to contact Games Away Tours Inc to verify all travel and ticket information.

Please ask to be grouped and seated with other Red Sox Natives when you register and e mail the organizer after you have purchased your reservation.
item.how_to_find_us: Contact Games Away Tours for Departure & Destination Info
item.name: Weekend Getaway Bruins vs Senators & Tale of Two Cities Ottawa and Montreal
